CHAT.comment: CONNECTICUT DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY, ET AL., Petitioners v. JOHN DOE, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF RICHARD BLUMENTHAL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SHELLEY R. SADIN ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF RICHARD BLUMENTHAL ON BEHALF [*48] OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:05 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
